content: I'm glad you like the coffee table, by the way! I also got a set of coasters and a vase from IKEA, but I haven't had the time to put them together yet. Anyway, the layout looks good, but I'm not sure about the armchair's position. Can you try placing it on the other side of the coffee table, so it's closer to the window? I want to make sure we can still have a good conversation while watching TV.
